data.message: Not feeling this as a single to be honest. Sounds more like something he'd have in the later part of the album. Strange.

replies.message: Fucking telling you how he's feeling. Good 1st single tbh
Setting up the rest of the album. Acknowledging everyone saying he fell off.
Carlos Mena Cortez realist song he's done in a very long time

I agree with you... This doesn't sound like a single at all... Sounds more like an Outro or something. It's not catchy, it won't play well at the radio (IMO) and it doesn't even have a real beat... Do I want to play it again? Maybe one or two more times but that's all...
It's his voice! i dont get why he sounds so different from Eminem show and Encore. Since Recovery he just sounds like he has the flu and is all bunged up. For me it takes away everything else.
